To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Excerpts of live radio performances by Lew Childre, Bill Monroe and The Bluegrass Boys, Milton Estes, Clyde and Marie Dilleha, Pee Wee King and His Golden West Cowboys, George W. Wilkinson and His Fruit Jar Drinkers, and Cowboy Copas, recorded from a broadcast of WSM's Grand Ole Opry (Nashville, Tenn.) with emcees Grant Turner, George D. Hay, and Louis Buck.

name.namePart: Bill Monroe and The Bluegrass Boys

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
